Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains continue to stand at Central Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing at Central Park due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
